Bearer.name: Authorization
Bearer.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: "Authorization: Bearer {token}"

get.summary: Get a list of workflows
get.description: Gets a list of workflows.

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of properties to include in the response

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of items to include in a page. Value must be an integer between 1 and 1000. Only one of pageSize or pageToken can be specified.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: Page offset descriptor. Valid page tokens are included in the response. Only one of pageSize or pageToken can be specified.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Specifies the order to include list items as "_{fieldName}_ [asc|desc]". The second field is optional and specifies the sort direction ("asc" for ascending or "desc" for descending).

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

post.description: Creates a new workflow and version (if provided).

201.description: Details of the newly created workflow.

409.description: A conflict was found. Ensure the workflow name is unique.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

get.summary: Get the details of a workflow
get.description: Gets the details of a workflow with a given ID.

parameters.name: workflowId
parameters.description: ID of the workflow

404.description: The workflow with the specified ID was not found.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

parameters.name: workflowId
parameters.description: ID of the workflow

404.description: The workflow with the specified ID was not found.

409.description: A conflict was found. Ensure the workflow name is unique.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

parameters.name: sort

get.summary: Get a list of tasks
get.description: Gets a list of tasks accessible by the current tenant ID.

parameters.name: names
parameters.description: Name: Optional parameter to filter the returned list. Case-Sensitive

parameters.name: acls
parameters.description: Name: Optional parameter to filter the returned list. Case-Sensitive

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Optional parameter to define the page size returned. Valid inputs range from 1-1000.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Sort: Optional parameter to set the sort of the returned list. Valid fields include: name, timeCreated, timeModified.
The sort can be specified as asc or desc. (Default: asc.)

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description:
pageToken: Optional parameter for navigation after initial listing. Valid values include firstPageToken,
nextPageToken, and previousPageToken (provided in the list response)

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

post.description: Creates a task. Returns the ID associated with the new task. Also returns the task version ID associated with the new task, if provided. Substitutions can be defined in the following format: "{{string}}", and specified at launch time.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

get.summary: Get the details of a Task
get.description: Gets the details of a Task for a given task ID.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

patch.description: Updates the task with a given ID. The task's name, description can be updated. The task's name must remain unique.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Details of the task to be updated.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

get.summary: Get a list of task runs
get.description: Get a list of task runs accessible by the current tenant ID.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Sort: Optional parameter to set the sort of the returned list. Valid fields include: name, status, timeCreated, timeModified.
The sort can be specified as asc or desc. (Default: asc.)

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Optional parameter to define the page size returned. Valid inputs range from 1-1000.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description:
pageToken: Optional parameter for navigation after initial listing. Valid values include firstPageToken,
nextPageToken, and previousPageToken (provided in the list response)

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

post.summary: Create and launch a task run
post.description: Creates and launches a task run. Returns the ID and status associated with the new task run.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

get.summary: Get the status of a task run
get.description: Gets the status of a task run for a given task run ID.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

put.description: Aborts a task run for a given task run ID. The task run is required to have a status of "Pending" or "Running".

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

post.description: Heartbeat a task run for a given task run ID. This notifies TES that a task run is executing.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

get.summary: Get a list of versions
get.description: Gets a list of task versions within the given task accessible by the current tenant ID.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Sort: Optional parameter to set the sort of the returned list. Valid fields include: name, version, timeCreated, timeModified.
The sort can be specified as asc or desc. (Default: asc.)

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Optional parameter to define the page size returned. Valid inputs range from 1-1000.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description:
pageToken: Optional parameter for navigation after initial listing. Valid values include firstPageToken,
nextPageToken, and previousPageToken (provided in the list response)

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

post.description: Creates a new task version within an existing task. Returns the ID associated with the new task version. Substitutions can be defined in the following format: "{{string}}", and specified at launch time.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

get.summary: Get the details of a task version
get.description: Gets details of a task version for a given task version ID.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

patch.description: Update details of a task version for a given task version ID.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

post.description: Launches a task version for a given task version ID. Returns the ID associated with the new task run. Substitutions defined in the task version must be specified.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

get.summary: Get details about a file, including a pre-signed URL for download
get.description: Get information and details for the specified file ID, including metadata and a pre-signed URL for file download. The URL can be used as a curl command or directly with S3.

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the file to retrieve.

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: Optional parameter to see shared data in another tenant

parameters.name: presignedUrlMode
parameters.description:
Optional parameter to specify presigned url's content-disposition. If not specified, the browser will determine the default behavior.
            Possible values: Attachment, Inline, Browser

parameters.name: includeVolumeMetadata
parameters.description: Optional parameter to return volume's metadata

parameters.name: metadata.include
parameters.description: Optional parameter to specify comma separated patterns to include metadata by their field names.

parameters.name: metadata.exclude
parameters.description: Optional parameter to specify comma separated patterns to exclude metadata by their field names.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description:
Optionally include additional fields in the response.
            Possible values: ObjectStoreAccess

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

patch.summary: Update a file entry in GDS and get temporary credentials for upload
patch.description: Update a file entry in GDS. Returns temporary credentials and presigned url(s) for file upload directly to S3 when the include=objectStoreAccess parameter is used. Note that the currently supported changes to the file resource are updating the file type and the underlying content.

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the file to be updated.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description:
Optionally include additional fields in the response.
            Possible values: ObjectStoreAccess

parameters.name: uploadPartCount
parameters.description: Optional number of parts for the presigned url for uploads (1 - 10000)

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

delete.description: Permanently delete a file entry and its underlying content

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the file to delete.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

post.summary: Create a file entry in GDS and get temporary credentials for upload
post.description: Create a file entry in GDS. Returns temporary credentials and presigned url(s) for file upload directly to S3 when the include=objectStoreAccess parameter is used. Volume ID or volume name is required for file creation. If a folder path is provided and does not exist, GDS creates the folder path in the appropriate account automatically.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description:
Optionally include additional fields in the response.
            Possible values: ObjectStoreAccess

parameters.name: uploadPartCount
parameters.description: Optional number of parts for the presigned url for uploads (1 - 10000)

409.description: A conflict was found. Make sure the new File doesn't already exist.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

patch.summary: Updates list of files with metadata
patch.description: Updates list of files with metadata

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

get.summary: Get a list of files
get.description: Given a volumeId or volume name, get a list of files accessible by the JWT. The default sort returned is alphabetical, ascending. The default page size is 10 items

parameters.name: volume.id
parameters.description: Optional field that specifies comma-separated volume IDs to include in the list

parameters.name: volume.name
parameters.description: Optional field that specifies comma-separated volume names to include in the list

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Optional field that specifies comma-separated paths to include in the list. Value can use wildcards (e.g. /a/b/c/*) or exact matches (e.g. /a/b/c/d/).

parameters.name: isUploaded
parameters.description: Optional field to filter by Uploaded files

parameters.name: archiveStatus
parameters.description: Optional field that specifies comma-separated Archive Statuses to include in the list

parameters.name: recursive
parameters.description: Optional field to specify if files should be returned recursively in and under the specified paths, or only directly in the specified paths

parameters.name: presignedUrlMode
parameters.description:
Optional parameter to specify presigned url's content-disposition. If not specified, the browser will determine the default behavior.
Possible values: Attachment, Inline, Browser

parameters.name: include
parameters.description:
Optionally include additional fields in the response. Multiple fields can be included by comma-separation.
Possible values: TotalItemCount, PresignedUrl, InheritedAcl

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: START_DESC END_DESC

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: START_DESC END_DESC

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: Optional parameter to see shared data in another tenant

parameters.name: metadata.include
parameters.description: Optional parameter to specify comma separated patterns to include metadata by their field names.

parameters.name: metadata.exclude
parameters.description: Optional parameter to specify comma separated patterns to exclude metadata by their field names.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

post.summary: Get a list of volume files
post.description: Gets file list by volume ID and an array of file IDs. The default sort returned is alphabetical, ascending

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

post.description: Copies a list of files enumerated by file Ids to a destination folder

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

post.description: Complete a file upload operation. If the file was uploaded using multipart uploads, combine all the multiple parts uploaded into one complete file.

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the file upload to be completed.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

parameters.name: volume.name
parameters.description: Optional field that specifies comma-separated volume names to include in the list

parameters.description: Optional field that specifies comma-separated paths to include in the list. Value can use wildcards (e.g. /a/b/c/*) or exact matches (e.g. /a/b/c/d/).

parameters.name: jobStatuses
parameters.description: Optional field that specifies comma-separated JobStatuses to include in the list

parameters.name: acls
parameters.description: Optional field that specifies comma-separated acls to include in the list

parameters.name: recursive
parameters.description: Optional field to specify if folders should be returned recursively in and under the specified paths, or only directly in the specified paths

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: START_DESC END_DESC

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: START_DESC END_DESC

parameters.name: include
parameters.description:
Optionally include additional fields in the response. Multiple fields can be included by comma-separation.
Possible values: TotalItemCount, InheritedAcl

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: Optional parameter to see shared data in another tenant

parameters.name: metadata.include
parameters.description: Optional parameter to specify comma separated patterns to include metadata by their field names.

parameters.name: metadata.exclude
parameters.description: Optional parameter to specify comma separated patterns to exclude metadata by their field names.

parameters.name: volumeConfigurationName
parameters.description: Unique name of the volume configuration to retrieve information for.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

delete.summary: Deletes a volume configuration by Id or name

parameters.name: volumeConfigurationName
parameters.description: Unique name of the Volume Configuration to be deleted.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

parameters.name: volumeConfigurationName
parameters.description: Unique name of the volume configuration to be validated.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

get.summary: Get a list of volumes
get.description: Get a list of volumes accessible by the current JWT tokens tenant ID in GDS. The default sort returned is alphabetical, ascending. The default page size is 10 items.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: START_DESC END_DESC

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: START_DESC END_DESC

parameters.name: include
parameters.description:
Optionally include additional fields in the response. Multiple fields can be included by comma-separation.
Possible values: TotalItemCount, InheritedAcl

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: Optional parameter to see shared data in another tenant

parameters.name: volumeConfigurationName
parameters.description: Unique name of the volume configuration

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

post.summary: Create a volume in GDS and receive temporary credentials for upload
post.description: Create a volume in GDS to hold folders and files. Returns upload credentials to the root folder of the volume when the include=objectStoreAccess parameter is used. You must create a volume prior to uploading files or folders.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description:
Optionally include additional fields in the response.
            Possible values: ObjectStoreAccess

409.description: A conflict was found. Make sure the new Volume doesn't already exist.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

get.summary: Get information for the specified volume ID or volume name

parameters.name: volumeId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the volume to retrieve information for.

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: Optional parameter to see shared data in another tenant

parameters.name: metadata.include
parameters.description: Optional parameter to specify comma separated patterns to include metadata by their field names.

parameters.name: metadata.exclude
parameters.description: Optional parameter to specify comma separated patterns to exclude metadata by their field names.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

patch.description: Update an existing volume in GDS and return upload credentials for that volume.

parameters.name: volumeId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the volume to be updated.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description:
Optionally include additional fields in the response.
            Possible values: ObjectStoreAccess

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

parameters.name: volumeId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the Volume to be deleted.

parameters.name: purgeObjectStoreData
parameters.description:
Optional and for BYOB only. If true, the volume's data in object storage will be erased.
            This field is ignored for non-BYOB volumes where the object store data is always removed upon deleting the volume.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

get.summary: Get a list of subscriptions.
get.description: Get a list of subscriptions accessible by the current JWT tokens tenant Id.

parameters.name: eventType
parameters.description: Optional event type for filtering returned subscriptions

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Optional parameter to define the page size returned. Valid inputs range from 1-1000.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description:
Utilized for navigation after initial listing. Valid values include those of
firstPageToken, nextPageToken, and previousPageToken in the list response.
When there are no more pages, the nextPageToken will be null.

400.description: An invalid or missing input parameter will result in a bad request.

401.description: The acting identity cannot be authenticated and authorized.

403.description: The acting identity is not authorized to access subscriptions.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

post.summary: Creates a subscription to an event type and defines how those events get delivered.
post.description: Events can be delivered to AWS SQS, AWS SNS, or can be used to launch a WES workflow.

400.description: An invalid or missing input parameter will result in a bad request.

401.description: The acting identity cannot be authenticated and authorized.

403.description: The acting identity is not authorized to subscribe to the given event type or deliver to the given delivery target.

409.description: The given delivery target is not valid or cannot be delivered to.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

get.summary: Given a subscription id, returns information about that subscription.
get.description: Given a subscription id, returns information about that subscription accessible by the current JWT tokens tenant Id.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Id of the subscription to return

200.description: Subscription for the given ID is found and returned successfully.

400.description: An invalid or missing input parameter will result in a bad request.

401.description: The acting identity cannot be authenticated and authorized.

403.description: The acting identity is not authorized to access the subscription for the given ID.

404.description: Could not find a subscription for the given ID.

410.description: The subscription for the given ID has been disabled.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

delete.summary: Given a subscription id, disables the specified subscription.
delete.description: Given a subscription id, disables that subscription with the current JWT tokens tenant Id.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Id of the subscription to be disabled

200.description: Subscription for the given ID is disabled successfully.

400.description: An invalid or missing input parameter will result in a bad request.

401.description: The acting identity cannot be authenticated and authorized.

403.description: The acting identity is not authorized to disable the subscription for the given ID.

404.description: Could not find a subscription for the given ID.

410.description: The subscription for the given ID has been disabled.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

credentials.description: Credentials associated with the connection. Format depends on type of connection.

options.description: Comma separated list of options associated with the connection: CredentialsRequired, AllowCredentialsOverride, AutoDisableCredentialsAfterUse, AllowHostOverride

autoDisableHttpMethod.description: Http method to use to disable the credentials. Must be POST, PUT or DELETE

description.description: User-defined description for the task run, if not specified task version description will be used

arguments.description: Arguments to launch a task run

keyPrefix.description:
Key prefix within the bucket for GDS to operate within. Volumes may only be created within this prefix and the given credentials need only authorize
access here. If not set, default is to allow operation on the full bucket. No leading slash, and must end with a trailing slash.

serverSideEncryptionAlgorithm.description:
Used to specify the type of server-side encryption (SSE) to be used on the object provider.
This value is used to determine the Amazon S3 header "x-amz-server-side-encryption" value.
For example, specify "AES256" for SSE-S3, or "AWS:KMS" for SSE-KMS.
By default if none is specified, "AES256" will be used.

serverSideEncryptionKey.description:
Used to specify the serve-side encryption key that might be associated with the specified server-side encryption algorithm
This value can be the AWS KMS arn key, to be used for the Amazon S3 header "x-amz-server-side-encryption-aws-kms-key-id" value
Value will be ignored if encryption is "AES256"

ArchiveStatuses.description: The valid Archive Status values for files in GDS

singlePartUrl.description: A single part presigned url for upload

multipartTemplate.description: A url template for multi parts presigned url for upload

multipartSignatures.description: Multi parts info that needs to be applied to the MultipartTemplate

serverSideEncryptionAlgorithm.description:
The server side encryption method used by S3.
This value is used to determine the Amazon S3 header "x-amz-server-side-encryption" value.
Possible values: 'AES256' and 'aws:kms'.

serverSideEncryptionKey.description:
Server-side encryption key that might be associated with the specified server-side encryption algorithm
This value can be the AWS KMS arn key, to be used for the Amazon S3 header "x-amz-server-side-encryption-aws-kms-key-id" value
This is only used when ServerSideEncryptionAlgorithm is 'aws:kms'

access_Key_Id.description: Access key for use with AWS S3

secret_Access_Key.description: Secret key for use with AWS S3

session_Token.description: Token for use with AWS S3

region.description: AWS region the folder will/does reside in

bucketName.description: AWS bucket the folder will/does reside in

keyPrefix.description: AWS upload location for this folder

serviceUrl.description:
Service endpoint for accessing S3.
This is optional for AWS S3, but mandatory for other services like Taiwan Computing Cloud.

serverSideEncryptionAlgorithm.description:
Used to specify the type of server-side encryption (SSE) to be used on the object provider.
This value is used to determine the Amazon S3 header "x-amz-server-side-encryption" value.
For example, specify "AES256" for SSE-S3, or "AWS:KMS" for SSE-KMS.
By default if none is specified, "AES256" will be used.

serverSideEncryptionKey.description:
Used to specify the serve-side encryption key that might be associated with the specified server-side encryption algorithm
This value can be the AWS KMS arn key, to be used for the Amazon S3 header "x-amz-server-side-encryption-aws-kms-key-id" value
Value will be ignored if encryption is "AES256"

acl.description: The list of directly specified Id(s) that have access to this Folder

inheritedAcl.description: The inherited list of Id(s) that have access to this Folder

timeCreated.description: The date & time this Folder was created, in GDS

timeModified.description: The date & time this Folder was updated, in GDS

jobId.description: The job identifier for the current folder operation. Currently only being used for the delete folder operation.

migrationStatus.description: Status of the root folder migration status from v1 to v2

activeJobIds.description: List of Jobs in Pending and In Progress status

restoreSpeed.description: The desired Restore Speed to move the Files in the Folder to the Standard Storage Tier. Valid values are Economy and Standard.

metadata.description: Metadata about this folder and its contents

acl.description: Optional array to replace the acl on the resource.

id.description: A unique identifier for this Folder

volumeId.description: The unique identifier for this Folder's Volume

parentFolderId.description: The unique identifier for this folder's parent folder

volumeName.description: The name of this Folder's Volume

tenantId.description: The unique identifier for this Folders's Tenant

subTenantId.description: The unique identifier for this Folder's Sub Tenant

itemCount.description: Number of items included in the page

nextPageToken.description: PageToken for the next paged list

prevPageToken.description: PageToken for the previous paged list

lastPageToken.description: PageToken for the last paged list. Only included when totalItemCount is listed

totalItemCount.description: Total number of items in all pages. Only included when requested

totalPageCount.description: Total number of pages. Only included when totalItemCount is listed

JobOperationParameters.description:
Container for XXXOperationParameters objects, which have additional details related to the specific job operation type.
Only one object will be populated.

JobOperationType.description:
The valid job operation type values for resources in GDS
IMPORTANT - Please consider backward compatibility before adding a new enum value. Adding a new enum value will break the existing client using swagger SDK

JobProgressStatus.description:
The valid Job Status values for folders in GDS.
IMPORTANT - Please consider backward compatibility before adding a new enum value. Adding a new enum value will break the existing client using swagger SDK

id.description: A unique identifier for this Job

parentFolderUrn.description: The Universal Resource Name of the parent folder associated with the Job

timeCreated.description: The date & time this Folder was created, in GDS

timeModified.description: The date & time this Job was updated, in GDS

timeCompleted.description: The date & time this Job was completed, in GDS

JobStatus.description:
This enum was originally created to store the type of job on a folder or file entity. 
The Job entity is now used to track this information for copy operations, with the Illumina.Gds.Api.Models.Enums.JobOperationType 
and Illumina.Gds.Api.Models.Enums.JobProgressStatus used to record the type and progress status of the job.
IMPORTANT - Please consider backward compatibility before adding a new enum value. Adding a new enum value will break the existing client using swagger SDK

ObjectStoreAccess.description: ObjectStoreAccess to get the temporaryCredentials per provider

secretName.description:
Platform credentials Name
Must provide either SecretId or SecretName

secretId.description:
Platform credentials Id
Must provide either SecretId or SecretName

etag.description: Etag response for the part upload

PartInfo.description: PartInfo of multi parts presigned url for upload

part.description: Part number to be applied to {part} in MultipartTemplate

date.description: Date to be applied to {date} in MultipartTemplate

dateTime.description: DateTime to be applied to {datetime} in MultipartTemplate

signature.description: Signature to be applied to {signature} in MultipartTemplate

RestoreType.description: Object Restore Types in Storage Engine

id.description: A unique identifier for this Session

folderUrn.description: The Universal Resource Name of the Folder associated with the Session

timeCreated.description: The date & time this Session was created, in GDS

timeCredentialsExpire.description: The date & time this upload session expires

timeClosed.description: The date & time this Session was closed, in GDS

timeCompleted.description: The date & time this Session was completed, in GDS

errorCode.description: Error code returned from the object store

VolumeFileListRequest.description: Request for listing files within a volume

includePresignedUrl.description: Optional parameter that returns presigned URL for each file when set to true

presignedUrlMode.description:
Optional parameter to specify presigned url's content-disposition. If not specified, the browser will determine the default behavior.
Possible values: Attachment, Inline, Browser

gracePeriodDays.description: Number of days before the files associated to this volume expires

VolumeMigrationOperationParameters.description: Operation parameters for volume migration operations

volumeId.description: The volume id for the migration operation

id.description: A unique identifier for this Volume

tenantId.description: The unique identifier for this Volume's Tenant

subTenantId.description: The unique identifier for this Volume's Sub Tenant

urn.description: The Universal Resource Name, unique to this Volume

rootFolderId.description: The unique identifier for the root Folder of this Volume

rootKeyPrefix.description: The base bucket location for Volumes associated with custom VolumeConfigurations otherwise this field is not set.

volumeConfigurationName.description:
Unique name of the Volume configuration for this Volume.
This field will only be set if a custom Volume configuration is associated.

type.description: Event type which will be subscribed to

actions.description: Actions which will be subscribed to for the event type

filterExpression.description: JSON-structured filter expression for events matching the subscription

DeliveryTarget.description: Configuration for the action to perform for events matching this subscription; only one delivery type may be specified

DeliveryTargetAwsSnsTopic.description: Configuration for an AWS SNS delivery topic

topicArn.description: ARN for the AWS SNS topic

DeliveryTargetAwsSqsQueue.description: Configuration for an AWS SQS delivery queue

queueUrl.description: URL for the AWS SQS queue

DeliveryTargetWorkflowRunLaunch.description: Configuration for a delivery via WES workflow run launch

id.description: Id of the workflow to launch

version.description: Version of the workflow to launch, for the given id

ErrorResponse.3.description: Details for an error which occurred

code.description: Error code which uniquely identifies the type of error which occurred

message.description: Description of the error which occurred

details.description: Additional details for conditions which caused the error

Subscription.description: Details for an Event Notification Service subscription

type.description: Type of event the subscription matches

actions.description: Types of actions the subscription matches for the event type

filterExpression.description: JSON-structured filter expression for events matching the subscription

matchIdentities.description: ACL Identities for events the subscription matches

acl.description: The list of identities that have access to this subscription

tenantId.description: Tenant id of the subscription owner

createdByUserId.description: User id for the creator of the subscription

timeCreated.description: Timestamp when the subscription was created

deletedByUserId.description: Id of the user who deleted the subscription, if applicable

timeDeleted.description: Timestamp when the subscription was deleted, if applicable

isDeleted.description: Whether or not the subscription has been deleted
